text: James Clark (born January 8, 1936) is an American former sports shooter. He competed in the trap event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:American male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of the United States Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Borger, Texas Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: James Clark (sport shooter)
